name: ActiFried Poutine
author: T-fal Canada
summary: Crispy ActiFried fries are covered with mozzarella cheese and hot beef gravy in this lighter version of poutine.
directions: Scrub potatoes and cut into fries of equal size, each about 1/2-inch (1 cm) thick on all sides
Rinse fries thoroughly in water; drain well
Use a clean kitchen towel to thoroughly dry fries
Place fries in the Actifry Pan
Drizzle evenly with half the oil
Cook for 40 minutes, or until the fries are crisp, golden, and cooked through
Season with half of the salt and pepper (adjust to taste)
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a small saucepan set over medium heat
Add flour and cook, stirring for 1 minute, or until flour is lightly browned
Whisk in broth and Worcestershire sauce
Cook, stirring often, for 5 minutes, or until thickened
Season with remaining salt and pepper (adjust to taste)
Top each serving with an equal amount of cheese
Drizzle with hot gravy to melt cheese
